title: initial-sync: Block is not processed error=nil justified block
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description When syncing a new db on Onyx, there is an issue with a nil justified block. The issue eventually resolved itself after many iterations of the first 600 blocks. ### Has this worked before in a previous version? Yes ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction ``` bazel run //beacon-chain --config=release -- --p2p-host-ip=$(curl -s v4.ident.me) --p2p-max-peers=15 --archive --clear-db --disable-new-state-mgmt ``` Other users have reported it with default flags. ## üî• Error 

[2020-06-14 00:57:17]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block 0xc6315363... 350/799 - estimated time remaining 10s blocksPerSecond=44.2 peers=19
[2020-06-14 00:57:17]  INFO initial-sync: Block is not processed error=nil justified block                                                                                                                 
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).shouldUpdateCurrentJustified
        beacon-chain/blockchain/process_block_helpers.go:271                                  
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).updateJustified
        beacon-chain/blockchain/process_block_helpers.go:289                     
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).onBlockInitialSyncStateTransition
        beacon-chain/blockchain/process_block.go:255
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).ReceiveBlockNoVerify
        beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_block.go:185
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync.(*Service).processBlock
        beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync/round_robin.go:180
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync.(*Service).roundRobinSync
        beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync/round_robin.go:68
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync.(*Service).Start
        beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync/service.go:149
runtime.goexit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1373
could not process block
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).ReceiveBlockNoVerify
        beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_block.go:186
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync.(*Service).processBlock
        beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync/round_robin.go:180
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync.(*Service).roundRobinSync
        beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync/round_robin.go:68
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync.(*Service).Start
        beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync/service.go:149
runtime.goexit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1373
## üåç Your Environment **Operating System:** 
  
linux amd64
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)** 199ab3ecb0b64dd1ae1ed7a00d97af1da3b7548c **Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?**
